answers.answer: Yes I'm 32 weeks and feel like that all the time
I jus hit 30 weeks & it seems like I rather hve a drink than food at times bc I hve the worse cotton mouth ever...
It is very normal but did you have a test for gestational diabetes that can do the same
Yes, I am drinking all the time! Root beer is my favorite lol
I will drink anything as long as it is cold. I'm talking water, Pepsi, mountain dew, juice, tea, milk, I mean anything as long as it is cold.. Lol

question: Is it normal for yu to be extra thirsty all of the time.? I seem to have extreme cotton mouth & it seems like I am drinking way more than I am eating..
title: thirsy all the time.??
